title: Over 100 volunteers unite for Warrington mayoral solstice litter pick
description: WARRINGTON residents came together for the town’s mayoral solstice litter pick, with 104 volunteers helping to clean up.

title: Keep up the great work Warrington Litter Networks!
description: CONGRATULATIONS to everyone involved with the volunteer Warrington Litter Networks who took part in the Great British Spring Clean recently, collecting over 300 tonnes of rubbish!

title: Daresbury Litter Network receives funding from Castle Green Homes
description: A NEW litter picking group in Daresbury has received £500 in funding.

title: Volunteer Litter Networks collect over three tonnes of rubbish as part of Great British Spring Clean
description: AN estimated 300 volunteers joined this year’s Great British Spring Clean (GBSC) organised by Warrington’s Litter Networks – collecting over three tonnes of litter – the third largest in the country.

title: Croft children lead the way in Spring Clean litter pick
description: YOUNGSTERS from Croft Primary School teamed up with the Croft Litter Network to take part in this year’s Great British Spring Clean, bringing the community together in a shared effort to care for the environment.

title: Another record-breaking year for Warrington Litter Networks
description: WARRINGTON’S volunteer litter networks are celebrating another record-breaking year collecting 8,660 bags of litter.

title: Town centre flats slammed 'health hazard' due to severe waste issue
description: RAT infestations caused by mounds of rubbish collecting at the back of a residential apartment block in town centre have been slammed a ‘health hazard’.

title: Litter Networks reach significant landmark for can recycling and raise money for charity!
description: WARRINGTONs Litter Networks have been recycling aluminium drinks cans since mid-2022 and has have just passed a significant landmark.

title: Litter volunteers break another record during GB Spring Clean!
description: VOLUNTEERS from the Warrington Litter Networks broke another record during the GB Spring Clean, collecting more than 500 bags of rubbish.

title: ‘Litter networks’ help keep Warrington tidy
description: ‘LITTER networks’ are helping to keep Warrington tidy – with a senior councillor labelling them as an ‘incredible force for good’.

title: Volunteers planning huge series of community litter picks as part of national event
description: A MASSIVE series of community litter pick is being organised as part of a national environmental movement.

title: Litter pickers celebrate first anniversary with 85 bags of rubbish and cake!
description: VOLUNTEERS from the Howley and Fairfield litter team held a special celebratory litter pick from Orford Park to celebrate their first anniversary at the weekend.

title: Praise for Warrington's litter network heroes
description: WARRINGTON Borough council has praised its hard-working and selfless communities and litter networks in response to findings from Keep Britain Tidy.

title: Litter Networks create new annual litter picking record for Warrington!
description: WARRINGTON's volunteer Litter Networks have created a new annual litter-picking record for the town!

title: MP joins devoted volunteers braving wintery weather to keep streets clean
description: A DEDICATED team of volunteers were able to showcase their work to one of the town?s MPs this week.

title: Dedicated volunteers smash record by removing 8,000 bags of litter from streets
description: A COMMITTED network of volunteers have set a new record for litter-picking by gathering 8,000 bags of litter in one year.

title: Litter Network volunteers aim to make Howley bloom in Spring!
description: VOLUNTEERS have been working hard to make Howley bloom next Spring by planting thousands of daffodil bulbs.

title: Volunteers keen to make 'positive difference' in Orford litter clean-up
description: VOLUNTEERS came together to tackle a notorious fly-tipping hot spot in Orford.

title: Volunteers carry out first ever complete Warrington A49 litter pick
description: VOLUNTEERS from Warrington Litter Networks rolled up their sleeves and completed a litter pick the whole length of the A49 through Warrington, from the M56 at Stretton, to Houghton Green at Winwick.

title: Teams remove record level of rubbish from canal as solution sought to save fish
description: A RECORD amount of rubbish has been cleared from Sankey Canal and the areas that surround it by dedicated volunteers.

title: Litter Networks team up to clear entire 15-mile length of Sankey Canal and 16-miles of Trans Pennine Trail
description: KEEP Britain Tidy's Great British Spring Clean achieved a major goal in Warrington at the weekend when several litter groups combined to tidy the entire 15-mile length of the Sankey Canal and a 16-mile stretch fo the Trans Pennine Trail.

title: Praise for 'amazing' efforts of Warrington street clean team
description: THE Police and Crime Commissioner helped a litter team tidy up part of the town centre as part of the Safer Streets campaign.

title: Dedicated volunteers of new litter pick group collect 71 bags of rubbish in first outing
description: VOLUNTEERS who care about their local community have removed dozens of bags of rubbish from the streets.

title: New Litter Networks volunteers brave the elements to collect more than 70 bags of rubbish!
description: VOLUNTEERS from a new Warrington Litter Networks group braved the elements to collect more than 70 bags of rubbish in and around the Howley area of town.

title: New litter network launched at Latchford by volunteers from Sikh Temple
description: A new litter network has been launched in Latchford by volunteers from the Guru Nanak Gurdwara Sikh Temple.

title: Teams making strides to change town’s reputation for litter collect 7,000 bags in a year
description: DEDICATED volunteers who gave up their spare time over 2021 removed close to 7,000 bags of rubbish from Warrington streets.

title: Litter Networks kept busy on World Clean Up Day
description: WARRINGTON'S Litter Networks were kept busty recently as part of World Clean Up Day earlier this month.

title: Important to support the community as we embrace the new normal
description: AFTER an unprecedented 18 months things appear to be gradually returning to normal, although in some cases it remains the new normal.

title: Warrington Worldwide Legacy Project No.1 - Litter Networks
description: VOLUNTARY group Litter Networks has become the first recipient of Warrington Worldwide's Legacy Project with a 500 donation towards their ongoing work in the community.

title: Litter picking heroes break new record collecting over 300 bags of rubbish
description: OVER the last two weekends, Warrington?s litter picking heroes broke some new records, collecting over 300 bags of rubbish!

title: Warrington’s litter heroes who have gathered 2,200 sacks of rubbish since January
description: A TEAM of volunteers from Warrington have been tackling the town’s litter problem, gathering 2,200 sacks of rubbish since January this year.

title: Volunteers fill two skips with 83 fly-tipped tyres and other bulky rubbish in Winwick
description: VOLUNTEERS managed to fill two skips with 83 tyres hauled from a brook running through Winwick.

title: Volunteers get the bug for tackling litterbugs!
description: VOLUNTEERS Paul Connor and James Coates have got the bug and big ideas for tackling Warrington's litterbugs and now the means to deliver them!

title: LETTERS: Great to see residents doing something about town's litter problem
description: There's a real momentum building, with people no longer willing simply to tut-tut and blame the council when they see litter, but actually do?

title: Army of volunteers tackle town’s ‘litter emergency’
description: WARRINGTON’S army of volunteers have been hailed for cleaning up the town after selfish acts of littering by a ‘thoughtless’ minority during…

title: Residents fight back against 'selfish' Litter-Bugs
description: A group of Croft residents has taken to the streets to pick up litter following a surge in the amount of waste lining the streets during lockdown.

title: Volunteers collect 62 bags of rubbish during nine mile litter picking marathon
description: COMMUNITY litter pickers from Clean Up My Community Warrington are wondering if they have created a litter picking record, after collecting 62 bags of rubbish covering nine miles in 12 hours.

title: Volunteers plan record-breaking 12 hour litter pick across Warrington
description: VOLUNTEERS are bidding to make a record-breaking local litter pick over 12 hours tomorrow (Sunday) - and are seeking funds to help future litter picks in the Warrington community.

title: Community groups tackling litter problems head-on
description: TWO community groups from Warrington joined forces to organise parallel litter picks to tackle and raise awareness of the litter problems facing Warrington and communities across the country.
